title: Ravens vs Steelers live stream: how to watch NFL online from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: Ravens and Steelers have traded heavy blows over the years
article: You'll be hard-pushed to find two more contrasting QBs than Lamar Jackson and Ben Roethlisberger, and it'll be equally absorbing and hilarious to see them both on the same field, Jackson moving like quicksilver, Big Ben more like rust. Read on as we explain how to get a Ravens vs Steelers live stream and watch the NFL game online from anywhere.
Jackson threw an embarrassing four interceptions to the Browns, but Baltimore's defense was on hand to bail Superman out for a change, lasering Cleveland's offense to grind out a huge W.
The Steelers, meanwhile, got a good old-fashioned whipping from the Bengals, and their defense, considered one of the best around mere weeks ago, has now surrendered 41 points in consecutive games.
In their past three they've given up an average of 195.3 yards on the ground, by far the worst in the league, and Jackson will be licking his lips at the prospect of a big bounceback game.

But it's been a while since we last saw the Ravens offense in full flow, and this showdown between two struggling units should be fascinating. Follow our guide on how to watch the Ravens vs Steelers online and get an NFL live stream wherever you are in the world right now.

If you've mismatched a holiday or you're away on business and you want to watch your country's coverage from abroad, then you'll need to use a VPN. This will help you dial in to a location back in your home country to avoid geo-blocks and regain access to the content and services you already pay for back home.
A VPN is perfect for this as it allows you to change your IP address so you appear to be in a completely different location when the big game is on.
